mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_기관업무기본 조회 (InstTaskMapper.getInstTask) */ SELECT brno ,task_se_cd ,mbr_id ,use_yn ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_INST_TASK" WHERE 1=1 AND brno = #{brno} AND task_se_cd = #{taskSeCd}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_기관업무기본 수정 (InstTaskMapper.updateInstTask) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_INST_TASK" SET mbr_id = coalesce(#{mbrId}, mbr_id) ,use_yn = coalesce(#{useYn}, use_yn) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND brno = #{brno} AND task_se_cd = #{taskSeCd}
